scripts.build: npm run build:module && npm run build:index
scripts.w:untouched: asc assembly/w.ts -t wasm/w.untouched.wat -b wasm/w.untouched.wasm --use Math=JSMath --runtime none --validate --sourceMap --measure
scripts.w:optimized: asc assembly/w.ts -t wasm/w.optimized.wat -b wasm/w.optimized.wasm -d wasm/w.optimized.d.ts --use Math=JSMath -O3 --importMemory --sourceMap --validate --measure
scripts.module:untouched: asc assembly/module.ts -t wasm/module.untouched.wat -b wasm/module.untouched.wasm --use Math=JSMath --runtime none --importMemory --validate --sourceMap --measure
scripts.module:optimized: asc assembly/module.ts -t wasm/module.optimized.wat -b wasm/module.optimized.wasm -d wasm/module.optimized.d.ts --use Math=JSMath -O3  --runtime none --importMemory --validate --sourceMap --measure --optimize
scripts.index:untouched: asc assembly/index.ts -b wasm/index.untouched.wasm -t wasm/index.untouched.wat --use Math=JSMath --runtime none --importMemory --sourceMap --debug --validate --measure
scripts.index:optimized: asc assembly/index.ts -b wasm/index.optimized.wasm -t wasm/index.optimized.wat -d wasm/index.optimized.d.ts --use Math=JSMath -O3  --runtime none --importMemory --sourceMap --validate --measure
scripts.06:untouched: asc assembly/06.ts -b wasm/06.untouched.wasm -t wasm/06.untouched.wat --use Math=JSMath --runtime none --importMemory --sourceMap --debug --validate --measure
scripts.06:optimized: asc assembly/06.ts -b wasm/06.optimized.wasm -t wasm/06.optimized.wat -d wasm/06.optimized.d.ts --use Math=JSMath -O3  --runtime none --importMemory --sourceMap --validate --measure
scripts.07:optimized: asc assembly/07.ts -b wasm/07.optimized.wasm -t wasm/07.optimized.wat -d wasm/07.optimized.d.ts -O3  --runtime none --sourceMap --validate --measure
